definition: an improbable and unexpected victory, change radically
details:
noun
- an improbable and unexpected victory
= synonyms: upset
- the act of upsetting something
= synonyms: upset, turnover
verb
- change radically
= synonyms: revolutionize, revolutionise
- rule against
= synonyms: overthrow, override, reverse, overrule
- cancel officially
= synonyms: reverse, lift, repeal, revoke, countermand, annul, rescind, vacate
- turn from an upright or normal position
= example: turn from an upright or normal position
= synonyms: turn over, tip over, tump over
- cause to overturn from an upright or normal position
= synonyms: upset, bowl over, turn over, tip over, tump over, knock over
- cause the downfall of
= synonyms: overthrow, bring down, subvert
